HiddenText.Name: How do I know if I'll be a successful online instructor?
HiddenText.OpenningText: How do I know if I'll be a successful online instructor?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Successful candidates enjoy writing, collaborating, and communicating through technologies like email, blogs, chat, and wikis. They are perceptive and eager to help students when they identify problems. They are also good time managers and engage in the course regularly and diligently.
